transcriptOfRecords.description: Great! You already have a lot of verified courses. Download a PDF with a list of your achievements. You can attach it to your CV or university applications.

form.title: Transcript of Records
form.description:
The Transcript of Records is a document from Kiron, which lists all the courses you completed that have been verified by the Kiron team.
You can use it to prove that you are studying online with Kiron. For example, you can add it to your CV to show certain skills and support your application for a job or a spot at a university.
Once you continue studying at a regular offline university, you can try to have the course credits you earned with Kiron recognized at the faculty where you are studying.
form.verificationWarning: Only completed and verified courses will appear on your Transcript. Please make sure that all courses you want on the Transcript are completed and verified before sending the request.
form.reasonTitle: What would you like to use the Transcript of Records for? (multi-select)
